thread.section_title: Better Life Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Life | www.cleanhappens.com
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I have almost every product Better Life makes and have never been disappointed. I wish they were at more local Targets in the Twin Cities, but I will usually buy it online in bulk. Their citrus soap is my favorite. I'm super excited to try out their Toilet Bowl cleaner. I feel safe using this around my house, family and pet. I feel better using this, than plain water or chemical wipes. The only thing they need to make next are safe Magic Erasers!!!
